name: Future in Crisis
text: Action: Exhaust your identity → remove Future in Crisis from the game. [acceleration][crisis] "It's gone. Nueva York is just...gone. How is this possible?"

name: Containment Breach
text: Electro has escaped his containment facility, seeking revenge on his captors once he's recharged! When Revealed: Each player discards the top 4 cards of their deck and places threat here equal to the number of [energy] resources discarded this way. [amplify]

name: Electro
text: Quickstrike. Retaliate 1. [star] Forced Response: After Electro attacks you, discard the top 4 cards of your deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each [energy] resource discarded this way. "I spent my entire existence bending the knee to humans, and I will be damned if I run from one now!"

name: Power Surge
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Take indirect damage equal to the number of [energy] resources discarded this way. If 2 or less damage was dealt this way, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ([boost]) for each [energy] resource in your hand.

name: Charged
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Response: After you discard any number of cards from the top of your deck, take 1 indirect damage. Hero Action: Choose to either take 2 indirect damage or discard a card you control with a printed [energy] resource → discard this card.
